subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The retirement of Jeremy Brown, a portly college catcher who was a central figure in “Moneyball,” is a good time to look back at the Athletics’ 2002 draft and see how the system worked.
snippet: The retirement of Jeremy Brown, a portly college catcher who was a central figure in “Moneyball,” is a good time to look back at the Athletics’ 2002 draft and see how the system worked.
